text:
@realDonaldTrump Over 1 million people are infected with #COVID19 & tens of thousands are dying & that empty head of yours thinks: "what better way to highlight my remarkable failure in leadership than to attack the media." 
Step aside & let a REAL MAN lead this country because You. Are. Not. It!

domain.name: Person
domain.description: Named people in the world like Nelson Mandela

domain.name: Politician
domain.description: Politicians in the world, like Joe Biden
